name: nytimes
text:
She carried a gene that would lead to an overlooked brain disease that would end her life one day, like it ended her mother's. So she quit her job as a lawyer and became a scientist.

Andy Samberg and Cristin Milioti star in the sometimes madcap, sometimes melancholy comedy “Palm Springs.” It’s a New York Times Critic’s Pick.

name: nytimes
text:
“You look into the mirror. Your life’s miseries imprinted there on your skin. Your pores gaping open at you like silently screaming mouths.” 

Read “A Blue Sky Like This,” a new short story by Mona Awad, written for @NYTmag's Decameron Project. https://t.co/ADo8GPLPCL
